Packages
```{r}
library(shiny)
library(dplyr)
library(sf)
library(viridis)
library(maps)
library(ggplot2)
library(purrr)
```

```{r}
unempData <- read.csv("data/wrangled.csv")
```

```{r}
unempData %>% ggplot(aes(x = Expected.Years.of.Schooling, y = Human.Development.Index)) + geom_point( aes(color = region)) + geom_smooth(method='lm')
```

```{r}
world_map2 <- maps::map("world", plot = FALSE, fill = TRUE) %>%
  st_as_sf()

ggplot(world_map2, aes(geometry=geom)) +
  geom_sf(fill = "lightgrey", color = "white") +
  theme_void()

```
